name: Savtira Corporation
overview: Savtira delivers an enterprise-class e-commerce platform for the marketing, selling and distribution of digital content and physical goods. Their Software-As-A-Service (SaaS) model is among the first to market with a single-shopping cart for both digital and physical goods. That translates to a superb and loyalty-building experience for your customers, as well as helping you increase revenues with cross-merchandising in ways youâ€™ve never been able to accomplish until now. They believe that user experience, whether on the web or other digital devices, including the smooth delivery of goods from retailers or suppliers to the customer, is crucial to success in 21st century e-commerce.
